General.Name: Shenzhen Nanshan Power Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen Nanshan Power Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells power and heat. It operates through three segments: Power Supply and Heating, Fuel Trading, and Other. The company generates power using gas turbine and waste heat, as well as offers technical consulting and services related to power stations. It also engages in the construction, operation, maintenance, and management of gas turbine power plants; and sludge drying activities. In addition, the company is involved in leasing gas turbine power generation, waste heat power generation, and power supply and heating facilities; wharfs, depots, and electricity facilities; and land use rights and nonresidential real estates. Shenzhen Nanshan Power Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Shenzhen, China.

3.Name: Ms. Jie  Zhang
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
